title: The marryed mans lesson: or, A disswasion from iealousie. To the tune of, All you that will wooe a wench.
author: M. P. (Martin Parker), d. 1656?
publicationStmtPublisher: For Iohn Wright, the younger, dwelling at the signe of the Sunne, at the lower end of Snow-hill, neere unto Holborne Conduit.,
